message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent fit for you. We are offering this remarkable product for $15,000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the expertise and craftsmanship that goes into it. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $15,000 is outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000, which is the price I'm comfortable with.  Let me know if that works for you.
